name: DOGESTORY
description:
A Game About Humanized Dogelore...

Buenos dias, welcome to the Dogestory demo.  This is a visual novel game based loosely off the characters in r/dogelore.  It's a relatively lax visual novel, with no dating elements and occasional jokes. Join in on conversations with the characters through the choices you make, and who knows, maybe those choices end up affecting the entire story. 

The full game is currently still in development, but I sure hope you enjoy the demo. It's a small glimpse of what the real game is like.  hrfehjhrjehhjrhejrrrhewhhwrjrhrrrrrgrghrghrrhrr r hhgrghrk whehhrehgrwjhjhehrgrhhgehhegreghhrghehgrhewgehhhrggrgrghghh

☺Press ‘space’ to progress dialogue 

☺This visual novel is in three dee! Enjoy two dee characters placed in campy, crude looking environments 

☺Camera looks between characters! Wow! 

☺There isn’t a way to save progress because....uh. 

☺There are cutscenes!!! 

☺Also music!!! By good friend huso

☺Funny dialogue

☺It’s funny 

Disclaimer: Game may have some bugs, but only if deliberate game breaking strategies are deployed. I am aware of these game breaks and I will work to fix them for the full release.

Content warnings I suppose:

> Some offensive-ish jokes  (meant to be lighthearted, not reflective of my personal beliefs)

>sometimes blood

>sometimes drug refs (no explicit stuff though)

> ☺

>Doge himself will not be in the demo, nor cheems. They will however, be in the real game.
